random

August 11, 2015

Here are some of the trip and trix I tend to use when testing out Dockers.

Check out How to Use Docker on OS X: The Missing Guide.

Getting Started with Docker for the Node.js Developer.

IP: http://192.168.99.100:8083

docker commit -a "Erik Aulin : erik@ustwo.com" -m "smb for munki" 2e21f29fcd90 smb-munki:latest

docker tag smb-munki erikaulin/smb-munki

docker push erikaulin/smb-munki

::Create the data container:: docker run -d --name munki-data --entrypoint /bin/echo erikaulin/munki Data-only container for munki

::Share the data container with the SMB protocol:: docker run -d -p 4445:445 --volumes-from munki-data --name smb erikaulin/smb-munki or start with random port docker run -d -p 445 --volumes-from munki-data --name smb erikaulin/smb-munki

::Start the nginx server:: docker run -d --name munki --volumes-from munki-data -p 8083:80 -h munki erikaulin/munki

Munki server on Dockers

https://clburlison.com/munkirepo-guide-part-2/ https://hub.docker.com/r/macadmins/munki/

https://hub.docker.com/_/alpine/

http://blog.hypriot.com/post/docker-compose-nodejs-haproxy/

https://docs.docker.com/kitematic/nginx-web-server/

https://www.afp548.com/2015/01/22/building-munki-with-docker/

https://medium.com/@ramangupta/why-docker-data-containers-are-good-589b3c6c749e

sudo mkdir /munki_repo

sudo mount -o rw -t nfs 10.2.0.200:/volume1/munkirepo /munkirepo

docker run -d -P --name web -v /src/webapp:/opt/webapp training/webapp python app.py

docker build -t "erikaulin/smb-munki" .

::Run Chef in Dockers:: Create a container docker run -d --name chef-data --entrypoint /bin/echo base/chef-server Data-only container for chef docker run -d --privileged --volumes-from chef-data -p 443:443 base/chef-server

::chef:: setup a client to use SSL key

knife bootstrap 10.2.3.8 --ssh-user admin --ssh-password '3eRok001' --sudo --use-sudo-password --node-name node1 --run-list 'recipe[motd]'

chef-server-ctl user-create --filename /etc/opscode/erik.pem erik Erik Aulin erik@ustwo.com 3eRok001

chef-server-ctl user-create --filename /etc/opscode/admin.pem admin Local Administrator it@ustwo.com fluffiUs2!

chef-server-ctl org-create ustwo SacredSF --association_user admin --filename /etc/opscode/chef-validator.pem

Overwrite /home/nmcspadden/.chef/knife.rb? (Y/N) Y Please enter the chef server URL: [https://chef:443] https://chef.domain.com:443/organizations/ssh Please enter an existing username or clientname for the API: [admin] erik Please enter the validation clientname: [chef-validator] ssh-validator Please enter the location of the validation key: [/etc/chef-server/chef-validator.pem] /etc/chef-server/ssh.pem Please enter the path to a chef repository (or leave blank):

loglevel :info loglocation STDOUT nodename 'erik' clientkey '/home/nmcspadden/.chef/erik.pem' validationclientname 'ssh-validator' validationkey '/etc/chef-server/ssh.pem' chefserverurl 'https://chefserver.ustwo.com:443/organizations/ssh' syntaxcheckcachepath '/root/.chef/syntaxcheckcache' cookbook_path '/root/chef-repo/cookbooks' knife[:editor]=/usr/bin/vim

/etc/pki/tls/certs/chef.ustwo.com.pem','r') error:2006D080:BIO routines:BIOnewfile:no such file) 2015-08-1412:57:26.32660 nginx: [emerg] BIOnew_file("/etc/pki/tls/certs/chef.ustwo.com.pem") failed (SSL: error:02001002:system library:fopen:No such file or directory:fopen('/etc/pki/tls/certs/chef.ustwo.com.pem

http://bealetech.com/blog/2013/06/14/custom-ssl-certificates-with-chef-11-server/

chef.ustwo.com.nopassphrase.key chef.ustwo.com.pem

  • "sslcertificate": "/etc/pki/tls/certs/ustwocom.crt",
  • "sslcertificatekey": "/etc/pki/tls/private/ustwo_com.key",
  • "sslcertificate": "/etc/pki/tls/certs/ustwocom.pem",
  • "sslcertificatekey": "/etc/pki/tls/private/ustwocom.nopassphrase.key", "ssldhparam": "/var/opt/opscode/nginx/ca/dhparams.pem", "sslcountryname": "US", "sslstatename": "WA",

cat ustwo.com.pem <(echo) sub.class1.server.ca.pem <(echo) ca.pem > chef.ustwo.com.pem

openssl s_client -connect chef.ustwo.com:443

nginx['sslcertificate'] = "/etc/pki/tls/private/chef.ustwo.com.pem" nginx['sslcertificatekey'] = "/etc/pki/tls/private/chef.ustwo.com.nopassphrase.key" nginx['sslciphers'] = "HIGH:MEDIUM:!LOW:!kEDH:!aNULL:!ADH:!eNULL:!EXP:!SSLv2:!SEED:!CAMELLIA:!PSK" nginx['ssl_protocols'] = "TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2"

openssl x509 -in client.crt -inform DER -out client-munki.crt.pem -outform PEM openssl rsa -in client.key -out client-munki.key.pem -outform PEM

openssl x509 -in client.crt -out client-munki.crt.pem -outform PEM openssl rsa -in client.key -out client-munki.key.pem -outform PEM

sudo defaults write /Library/Preferences/ManagedInstalls ClientCertificatePath "/Library/Managed Installs/certs/client-munki.crt.pem" sudo defaults write /Library/Preferences/ManagedInstalls ClientKeyPath "/Library/Managed Installs/certs/client-munki.key.pem"

sudo /usr/local/munki/managedsoftwareupdate -vvv --checkonly

sudo /usr/bin/security add-trusted-cert -d -r trustRoot -k "/Library/Keychains/System.keychain" /usr/local/munki/munki.grivet-tools.cert

/usr/bin/security add-trusted-cert -d -r trustRoot -k "/Library/Keychains/System.keychain" /Library/Managed\ Installs/certs/client.crt
